Modern Design

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” header_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Leading enterprises are evolving into lean, tech-savvy, optimized operations, demanding work processes be better, stronger, and faster. To compete, it’s time to identify technological solutions and product features that can increase your perceived value.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”PRODUCT SPRINTS” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-biz-strategy.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.2″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Take the guesswork out of brand strategy and customer acquisition with an intelligent collaboration and rapid problem solving processe.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=” MULTIDISCIPLINARY DESIGN” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-design.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Bring a team of specialized designers together to outperform what any single designer can accomplish.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”80px|0px|80px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

Next-gen Tech Specialist

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” header_font=”||||||||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade”]

Don’t build just any product, build the right product and exceed customer expectations by delighting users with beauty, elegance and function.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”User Testing” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-meagaphone.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Building a great product is just the beginning, we’ll help you build and execute robust user testing to validate your ideas.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”APP DEVELOPMENT” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-app-development.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Mobile apps and progressive web apps are just the start. Let us help you fire up your AR/VR, Connected Hardware, Blockchain/dApps, Chatbots, and other new technology projects.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto auto 0;” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/build-illustration.svg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/hexagon-bg4.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_padding=”29px|0px|80px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto auto 0;” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/monitor-illustration.svg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

Data Analysis

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” animation_style=”fade”]

Testing and validating hypothesis faster means spending less time on what isn’t working and more time to discover and repeat what does.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”ANALYTICS IMPLEMENTATION” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-tracking.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.2″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Track every important event from detailed user profiles and accelerate the velocity of innovation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=” MARKETING AUTOMATION” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-roadmapping.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Let’s integrate your marketing stack to capture leads, reduce churn and effectively compete in your industry.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”80px|0px|29px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

Strategy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade”]

Where marketing and technology meet to find innovative ways for your customers to discover your product and share your product and their experiences with the world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”MARKET RESEARCH” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-marketing-support.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.2″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Our strategies are built on qualitative and quantitative analysis compiled through deep research from sources you can trust.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”CUSTOMER ACQUISITION STRATEGY” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ic-growth-hacking.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.2″ header_level=”h6″ header_font=”|600||on|||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.2″ text_font=”||||||||” animation_style=”fade”]

Research based strategies that will give you the best chance to start growing your customer base with confidence.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto auto 0;” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/grow-illustration.svg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/bottom-hex-bg.svg” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” custom_padding=”58px|0|58px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”29px|0px|29px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Simple Pricing

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

We keep our pricing as straight forward as possible so we can focus on the things that matter the most – helping you build an amazing brand and business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ padding_top_bottom_link_1=”true” padding_top_bottom_link_2=”true” padding_left_right_link_1=”true” padding_left_right_link_2=”true” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px” custom_css_main_element=”border-radius:6px;||border: 1px solid #DDE8E6;||background-color:#fff;” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”28px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||” custom_padding=”||16px”]

Retainer Program

We recommend this model if you have ongoing and long-term outsourcing requirements. With the retainer program, you will have dedicated resources at your disposal to work on your backlog of tasks or planned roadmap.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_font_size=”12px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”72px||” custom_padding=”||32px”]

WHAT’S RIGHT FOR YOU?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.19.2″]

[/et_pb_code][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#58BA52″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#2f8f83″ button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”64px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px” custom_css_main_element=”border-radius:6px;||border: 1px solid #DDE8E6;||background-color:#fff;” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”28px” text_orientation=”center”]

Fixed Cost

We can quote for a project with a fixed timeline and cost provided that the detailed specification can be provided to us by the client.

Brightscout charges a premium based on our hourly rate benchmark price, to cover the risks of underestimation, requirement creeps, revisions and also the potential downtime period, time to wait for a response.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_font_size=”12px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px”]

FEEL FREE TO

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#58BA52″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#2f8f83″ button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”20px|40px|20px|40px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
